articles.title: The FA and UEFA are in talks to switch next summer's Euros to the UK due to the coronavirus pandemic - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY MIKE KEEGAN: While UEFA's Plan A remains to host the event in 12 cities across Europe, alternatives are being explored because of the Covid-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
The UK could host next summers Euros, Sportsmail has learned, with talks having already taken place between the FA and Uefa about switching the tournament to these shores.

articles.author: Lucy Thornton, Kirsty Feerick
articles.title: Pub has TVs removed after fans watching Scotland game 'break Covid rules' - Daily Record
articles.description: A police investigation is underway after a video of fans celebrating Scotland's win at The Draft Project in Aberdeen allegedly showed them flouting Covid-19 rules.
articles.content:
A pub has had their TVs removed after a video of punters celebrating Scotlands victory over Serbia was splashed on social media.
